rule.name: alternative_solution_requires_solution_definition

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(pdf <* solution_versions | SIZEOF(QUERY(pd <* USEDIN(pdf, 'ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_MIM' + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION.FORMATION') | pd.frame_of_reference.name = 'alternative definition')) <> 1))= 0

rule.name: restrict_alternative_definition

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pd <* solution_definitions |(SIZEOF (QUERY (pdr <* USEDIN (pd ,'ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_MIM' + '.PRODUCT_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_PRODUCT_DEFINITION') | pdr.name = 'solution alternative definition')) <>1))) = 0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pd <* solution_definitions |(pd.name IN ['supplier' , 'technical supplier']) AND (SIZEOF (QUERY (aoa <* USEDIN (pd.formation ,'ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_MIM' + '.APPLIED_ORGANIZATION_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS') | aoa.role.name = 'supplier')) <>1))) = 0

rule.name: solution_definition_requires_solution_category

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pdr <* product_definition_relationship |(pdr. name = 'solution alternative definition') AND(NOT(pdr. relating_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name IN [ 'alternative definition' , 'functional definition' , 'conceptual definition' ]) OR(pdr.related_product_definition.frame_of_reference.name<>'alternative definition')))) =0
